### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE network_performance_monitoring (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    network_device VARCHAR(255),
    network_status VARCHAR(255)
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE network_performance_monitoring SET network_status = 'Good' WHERE id = 1;
